    <span id="ctl00_MainContent_DetailedOutput"><h1 class="title">Duneshaker Solifugid</h1>The largest solifugids, duneshakers, literally make the terrain around them tremble.<br /><br /><b><u><a href="Skills.aspx?ID=5&General=true">Recall Knowledge - Animal</a></u> (<u><a href="Skills.aspx?ID=10">Nature</a></u>)</b>: DC 38<h1 class="title"><a href="Monsters.aspx?ID=485">Duneshaker Solifugid</a><span style="float:right;">Creature 18</span></h1><a target="_blank" href="Images\Monsters\Solifugid.png"><img class="thumbnail" src="Images\Monsters\Solifugid.png"></a><span alt="Neutral" class="traitalignment" title="Neutral">N</span><span alt="Gargantuan" class="traitsize" title="Gargantuan">Gargantuan</span><span alt="Animal Trait" class="trait" title="An animal is a creature with a relatively low intelligence. It typically doesn’t have an Intelligence ability modifier over –4, can’t speak languages, and can’t be trained in Intelligence-based skills."><a href="Traits.aspx?ID=9">Animal</a></span><br /><b>Source</b> <a href="https://paizo.com/products/btq02065" target="_blank" class="external-link"><i>Pathfinder #149: Against the Scarlet Triad pg. 89</i></a><br /><b>Perception</b> +30; darkvision, tremorsense (imprecise) 30 feet<br /><b>Skills</b> <a href="Skills.aspx?ID=1"><u>Acrobatics</a></u> +33, <a href="Skills.aspx?ID=3"><u>Athletics</a></u> +35, <a href="Skills.aspx?ID=15"><u>Stealth</a></u> +33 (+37 in desert)<br /><b>Str</b> +9, <b>Dex</b> +7, <b>Con</b> +7, <b>Int</b> -5, <b>Wis</b> +4, <b>Cha</b> -4<hr /><b>AC</b> 42, <b>Fort</b> +31, <b>Ref</b> +33, <b>Will</b> +28<br /><b>HP</b> 340<hr /><b>Speed</b> 50 feet, burrow 25 feet, climb 25 feet<br /><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Melee</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction_I.png"> jaws +35 (<a href="Traits.aspx?ID=192"><u>reach 10 feet</a></u>), <b>Damage</b> 4d10+17 piercing</span><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Melee</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction_I.png"> claw +35 (<a href="Traits.aspx?ID=170"><u>agile</a></u>, <a href="Traits.aspx?ID=192"><u>reach 20 feet</a></u>), <b>Damage</b> 3d10+17 slashing</span><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Earth Shaker</b> The first time per turn the duneshaker solifugid moves adjacent to a Large or smaller creature, that creature must succeed at a DC 39 <a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Skills.aspx?ID=1">Acrobatics</a> check or fall <a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Conditions.aspx?ID=31">prone</a>.</span><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Pounce</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction_I.png">  The duneshaker solifugid Strides and makes a Strike at the end of that movement. If the duneshaker solifugid began this action <a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Conditions.aspx?ID=22">hidden</a>, it remains hidden until after this ability’s Strike.</span><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Rend</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Single Action" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\OneAction_I.png">  claw</span><span class="hanging-indent"><b>Venom Spray</b> <img class="actiondark" alt="Two Actions" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\TwoActions.png"><img class="actionlight" alt="Two Actions" style="height:15px; padding:0px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Actions\TwoActions_I.png">  (<a href="Traits.aspx?ID=126"><u>poison</a></u>) The duneshaker solifugid spews toxic barbs at all creatures in a 30-foot cone. Each creature within the cone takes 10d6 poison damage (DC 39 basic Fortitude save). A creature that fails is <a style="text-decoration:underline" href="Conditions.aspx?ID=1">blinded</a> for 1d6 rounds (or permanently on a critical failure). The duneshaker solifugid can’t use Venom Spray again for 1d4 rounds.</span><h2 class="title">All Monsters in "<a href="MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=114">Solifugid</a>"</h2><table class="inner"><tr><td><b>Name</b></td><td><b>Level</b></td></tr><tr><td><a href="Monsters.aspx?ID=485">Duneshaker Solifugid</a></td><td>18</td></tr><tr><td><a href="Monsters.aspx?ID=484">Giant Solifugid</a></td><td>1</td></tr></table><h1 class="title"><a href="MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=114">Solifugid</a></h1><b>Source</b> <a href="https://paizo.com/products/btq02065" target="_blank" class="external-link"><i>Pathfinder #149: Against the Scarlet Triad pg. 89</i></a><br />Giant solifugids are monstrous vermin with six legs and two large feeding appendages easily mistaken for an additional pair of legs. They are often called camel spiders, sun spiders, or wind scorpions, despite the fact that they are neither spiders nor scorpions.<h3 class="title"><img alt="Sidebar - Additional Lore" title="Sidebar - Additional Lore" style="height:20px; padding:2px 2px 0px 2px" src="Images\Icons\Sidebar_2_AdditionalLore.png"> Solifugid Burrows</h3>Most species of solifugid lay their eggs in burrows. The female doesn’t eat while guarding her eggs, and thus fights even more aggressively against any creatures she deems potential threats to her brood. The bodies of wayward adventurers often litter such burrows, though the risks of exploring such treasure-laden nests often deter fortune-hunters from trying their luck with such caches.</span>

  <script>
      initiateToggle(document.getElementById('theme-toggle'));
      initializeMenuToggle(document.getElementById('minMaxMenu'));
      var initializeSearch = function (search) {
          var button;
          var text;
          if (search.firstElementChild.classList.contains('search-input'))
              text = search.firstElementChild;
          if (search.lastElementChild.classList.contains('search-input'))
              text = search.lastElementChild;
          if (search.firstElementChild.classList.contains('search-button'))
              button = search.firstElementChild;
          if (search.lastElementChild.classList.contains('search-button'))
              button = search.lastElementChild;

          if (search) {
              search.addEventListener('keypress', function (e) {
                  if (e.keyCode == 13) {
                      e.preventDefault();
                      if (text.value != null && text.value.length > 0)
                          window.location = window.location.origin + "/Search.aspx?query=" + text.value;
                  }
              })
          }
          if (button) {
              button.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
                  window.location = window.location.origin + "/Search.aspx?query=" + text.value;
              });
          }
      };
      var initializeExpand = function (toggle) {
          var targetAttrString = "[data-target='" + toggle.dataset.toggle + "']";
          //target = menu to be collapsed
          var target = document.querySelector(targetAttrString);
          toggle.addEventListener('click', function () {
              var expanded = target.classList.contains('expanded');
              expanded = !expanded;
              if (expanded) {
                  //hide other in group if exists
                  if (target.dataset.group) {
                      var otherExpanded = document.querySelector('.expanded[data-group="' + target.dataset.group + '"]');
                      if (otherExpanded) {
                          otherExpanded.classList.remove('expanded');
                      }
                  }
                  target.classList.add('expanded');
              } else {
                  target.classList.remove('expanded');
              }
          });
      };
      (function () {
          //toggles = link that expands/collapses target
          var toggles = document.querySelectorAll('[data-toggle]');
          toggles.forEach(function (toggle) {
              initializeExpand(toggle);
          });
          //searches
          var searches = document.querySelectorAll('.search');
          searches.forEach(function (search) {
              initializeSearch(search);
          });
      })();
  </script>
